title: Scott Disick's girlfriend Sofia Richie gets her NINTH tattoo
text:
Scott Disick's model girlfriend Sofia Richie has a new tattoo.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians guest star showed off her fresh ink in an Instagram post from Monday evening with the caption, 'Gratitude.'

The inking is large and is on her forearm. The design, by Scott Campbell - a 42-year-old New York–based tattoo artist whose clients include Robert Downey Jr and Orlando Bloom - has a diamond around a circle with crosses on two sides.

Tat's a lot to take in: Scott Disick's girlfriend Sofia Richie has a new tattoo. The Keeping Up With The Kardashians guest star showed off her fresh ink in an Instagram post from Monday evening with the caption, 'Gratitude'

Always taking selfies: Here the pinup is seen in a white top and black slacks as she posed in her roomy home

Richie already has eight tattoos. There is one on her right wrist that reads Never Let Go. When she holds someone's hand, the tattoo can be seen easily.

On the back of her neck it reads Clarity in all capital letters but she has to wear her hair up for anyone to see it.

There is also the initials MBR on her right thumb; its for her older brother Miles Brockman Richie.

On her middle finger there is a tattoo of a cross made by tattoo artist Jon Boy.

Model behavior: Last week she posed in this bra top and skirt from Misguided

Behind her right ear her last name is written in cursive.

And behind her neck is 13:4 which is a verse from Corinthians and means 'Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.'

On her ankle is L for her father, All Night Long crooner Lionel Richie, 70, who is also the father to reality TV star turned fashion designer Nicole Richie.

And on her wrist is Loyalty written in cursive.

This posting comes after she showed off her bottom on social media.

There was a black mark on her backside and she explained: 'Cool I backed into my tire.'

Rock solid view: The model also gave her 5.7 million Instagram followers a full view of her sporty ensemble from Emily Ratajkowski's Inamoratawoman clothing brand

Revealing: In the quick clip, Richie appears to be walking into a living room, or possibly a hotel room, wearing grey-blue bike shorts

In the quick clip she shared on her Insta-Story, Richie appears to be walking into a living room, or possibly a hotel room, with a long tire mark along her grey-blue bike shorts.

That tire mark looked to be at least a foot long and stretched nearly the entire length of her derriere.

Richie also shared another photo taken around the same time of herself in her revealing ensemble, which also included a matching sports bra from pal Emily Ratajkowski's Inamoratawoman clothing brand.

In the selfie, she's again sporting a seductive look, while wearing stylish sunglasses.

For her impromptu photo-shoot the star wore her blonde tresses styled long, straight and with a part in the middle.

Red hot: Richie set Instagram on fire with this topless photo on Instagram on Thursday

The California native took to Instagram with that sultry photo of herself posing topless in nothing but Rolla jeans two days ago.

'How’s your Thursday?' she asked in the caption.

A number of her celebrity friends were happy to respond with flattering remarks, although beau Disick offered up a little of his matter-of-fact humor.

'It's not bad, thanks,' the Keeping Up With The Kardashians star commented.

The couple have reported been dating since May 2017.
